title: Improvement Process of E-Learning Environments Based on Learning Object Ontology

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Application of a feedback system to improve learners' content comprehension in blended learning environments for strengthening social studies teaching competencies

learning_goals: Improve the appropriateness of online learning materials by over 80% using a learning object ontology-based feedback system
Generate at least three types of personalized feedback by analyzing interaction data among learning activities, content, and learners
Derive at least five semantic connections between learning materials by applying semantic annotation technology
Enhance the quality metrics of existing e-learning content packages by at least two levels using the LOCO-Analyst tool
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
